English: Don't let it get you down, my apprentice.
German: Lass dich davon nicht beirren, mein Schüler.

English:
As I said, all things are transient in the world
of seduction! Reality can indeed be cruel... Don't
forget that, and you'll be golden.
Chinese:
我說過了吧！　搭訕的世界是很無常的！！
現實有時很殘酷……能夠理解這件事情最為重要！
既然你知道搭訕有多麼虛幻，我就沒東西可以傳授了……
Korean:
말했지! 헌팅의 세계는 제행무상!!
때로 현실은 괴롭고 엄혹하다……그걸 아는 것이 가장 중요하다!
헌팅의 덧없음을 알게 된 너에게 더 이상 가르칠 것은 없다……
German:
Wie schon gesagt, kann sich jederzeit alles
ändern! Die Realität kann grausam sein ...
Behalt das im Kopf, dann klappt das schon.

English: Alright, time for the real deal.
German: So, jetzt machen wir jedenfalls ernst.

English:
What, don't tell me you forgot your training?
Shoot for the stars!
Chinese:
幹麼驚訝，你忘了嗎？
目前為止都只是練習，
最重要的是如何成功射下目標的心！
Korean:
뭘 놀라는 거야. 잊었어?
지금까지는 연습. 중요한건 실전에서 성공하는 거잖아!
German:
Wie, du hast doch nicht etwa dein Training
vergessen? Immer hohe Ziele setzen!

English:
Even if you successfully pick up all those girls,
it'll be meaningless if you can't seduce Yuuko!
Chinese:
就算剛剛的搭訕全部都成功，
只要沒有攻下最重要的小悠子，都毫無意義！
Korean:
만일 아까 한 헌팅을 전부 성공했다고 해도
정작 유코 양을 함락시키지 못하면 의미가 없어!
German:
Auch, wenn du dir einen ganzen Fanclub angelst,
hilft das nichts, wenn du nicht an Yuuko
rankommst!

English:
She likes to go around sampling food, and she
often goes to the shops she likes.
Chinese:
她的興趣是邊走邊吃，
只要是喜歡的店就會光顧很多次。
Korean:
그녀는 먹으러 다니는게 취미인데 마음에 든 가게는
자주 찾아온다고 한다
German:
Sie probiert gerne Essen und geht oft in Läden
wie diesen hier.

English:
She's got quite a lot of places she frequents, so
let's look for her favorite joints in Nakano!
Chinese:
行動範圍相當大啊……
這次就先去光顧率最高，中野那裡的餐廳找找吧！
Korean:
출몰 범위는 상당히 넓지만……
이번엔 빈도가 높은 나카노의 음식점을 찾아보자구!
German:
Sie hat einige Favoriten, also schauen wir mal
in Nakano!
